title: the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted by the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency 
Act 2007 (Biofuel Obligation Buy-out Charge) (Amendment) Regulations

title: the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted by the
heading: 3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Biofuel Obligation Buyout Charge) Regulations 2010 (S.I. 644 of 2010) are amended by the
text_raw:
3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Biofuel Obligation Buyout Charge) Regulations 2010 (S.I. 644 of 2010) are amended by the 
substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 2:
text_norm: 3 national oil reserve agency act 2007 (biofuel obligation buyout charge) regulation 2010 (s.i 644 2010) amended substitution following regulation regulation 2

title: the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) (as adapted by the
heading: 2. For the purposes of section 44J of the National Oil Reserves
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of section 44J of the National Oil Reserves 
Agency Act 2007 (No. 7 of 2007) the amount of the buy-out price 
referred to in that section is 1 euro. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 May 2022. 

EAMON RYAN 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th May, 2022.
